title: Google\Cloud\Firestore\Admin\V1\Index\IndexField
name: IndexField
description:
A field in an index.

The field_path describes which field is indexed, the value_mode describes how the field value is indexed.

Generated from protobuf message google.firestore.admin.v1.Index.IndexField

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.field_path
params.description: Can be name. For single field indexes, this must match the name of the field or may be omitted.

params.name: data.order
params.description: Indicates that this field supports ordering by the specified order or comparing using =, !=, <, <=, >, >=.

params.name: data.array_config
params.description: Indicates that this field supports operations on array_values.
